name: NiteSpy LLC
tag_list: nightlife, social-networking, drinks, club, bar, lounge, venue, partybus
overview:
NiteSpy is a “nitelife” social networking iPhone application which allows users to rate venues, and see the top venue ratings in any city within the United States based on live feedback from members of the NiteSpy “nitelife” community.

Have you ever wondered where to go out or what place is Poppin’ tonight? Would you like to save yourself the hassle of going from place to place before you find what’s good in town? Well NiteSpy is now here to save you time and money.

This application is designed to give users a sense of how venues are doing at any given point in time. Besides being able to rate and view the live rating of a venue, users are also able to check-in, see the girl to guy ratio, view pictures, stories and write reviews in a real time environment. Check-in locations, pictures and stories can be posted onto Facebook or Twitter using the share feature of the application.

Users will be able to sign up for NiteSpy or login using their Facebook credentials. Each user will have his/her own profile page, be able to add friends, send messages, pictures and invites to events. The sharing of all personal user information can be controlled using our easy-to-use privacy settings.
